gear.name: airhypo
attributes: Discard to Heal 1 on model when Inspire Team

gear.name: arasaka quickstrike blade
attributes: REactions made using this attack gain Accurate

gear.name: assault rifle
attributes: Rapid 2 at YELLOW and GREEN range

gear.name: authorized drone strike
attributes: Place up to 2 impact tokens in base contact with up to 2 visible models. All models within RED of an impact token win a Reflexes roll vs Obstacle die or suffer a wound. The Obstacle die gains a bonus equal to this model's Tech Skill

gear.name: corporate credit card
attributes: Draw one card from teh Loot deck. You may equip it to this model or any friendly model within RED

gear.name: grapple gun
attributes: Discard during this model's activation to climb GREEN without using an Action Token or rolling.

gear.name: incendiary rounds
attributes: This model's ranged attacks gain Dangerous and Deadly Crits.

gear.name: ir goggles
attributes: This model may ignore 1 obstacle when targeting models within GREEN.

gear.name: metalgear
attributes: This model's melee attacks gain Deadly Crits.

gear.name: net suit
attributes: When this model ends a move, another visible friendly model may move the same distance.

gear.name: acid soaker
attributes: Target discards one random Gear card. After the Gear is determined, you may discard a Luck token to choose a different Gear card to be discarded instead

gear.name: assault rifle
attributes: Rapid 2 at YELLOW and GREEN range

gear.name: bozo bombs
attributes: Before rolling you may discard a Luck token to give this action Deadly Crits.

gear.name: flower gag
attributes: This model gains +2 to Melee while opposing Melee Attacks which target it.

gear.name: giggle juicer
attributes: Replace target Gonk with a Fool under your control.

gear.name: grapple gun
attributes: Discard during this model's activation to climb GREEN without using an Action Token or rolling.

gear.name: grenade pie
attributes: This attack gains Deadly Crits if all of the target's Action Tokens are Used.

gear.name: grim grin grin
attributes: When you Inspire Your Team, roll a RED die: Fumble=This model peforms a full activation, controlled by your opponent. Refresh all of its action tokens afterwards. 2=This model suffers a wound. 3-4=This model moves RED for free. 5+=This model permanently gains a YELLOW Action Token.

gear.name: inflatable mallet
attributes: This attack only deals a wound if a critical is rolled. If this attack rolls a fumble, gain a Luck token.

gear.name: lucky charm
attributes: Place 2 Luck tokens on this Gear when it is equipped. Only this model my use these Luck tokens.

gear.name: rocket skates
attributes: When this model activates, it may move GREEN for free. This model's basic move actions gain Dangerous.

gear.name: spinning bowtie deflector
attributes: If an attack causes this Armor to be discarded, this model may REAct to the attack as if it had been wounded.

gear.name: stims
attributes: When you Inspire Your Team, roll a RED die: Fumble = This model takes 1 sound; 2+ = Move RED for free.

gear.name: the doctor gag
attributes: If this attack is successful, this model may suffer a wound to make the tager suffer an additional wound. If this attack fumbles, gain a Luck token.

gear.name: the joke reverser
attributes: After an Impact token is placed within YELLOW of this model, this model may discard a Luck token to move the Impact token, as long as the original target is still hit by the Blast.

gear.name: the last laugh
attributes: When this model is taken out, before removing it, place an Impact token in base contact with it (this model is the original target). All models within RED must win a Reflexes roll vs the Obstacle die or suffer a wound. The Obstacle die gains a bonus equal to this model's Tech Skill.

gear.name: whoopee cushion
attributes: Before a rival within RED rolls a die, you may spend a Luck token to force them to roll a RED die instead of the color they would have used.

gear.name: advanced targeting matrix
attributes: All of this model's non-melee attacks gain Accurate

gear.name: airhypo
attributes: Discard to Heal 1 on model when Inspire Team

gear.name: assault rifle
attributes: Rapid 2 at YELLOW and GREEN range

gear.name: caltrops
attributes: Discard during this model's activation to place an Impact token witin RED. Rivals that end a move action within RED of that token must pass a Reflexes roll vs the Obstacle die or suffer a wound.

gear.name: grenade neuroreactive
attributes: Each model wounded by this attack that is not taken out must take one action, for free, controlled by this model's controller.

gear.name: grenade smoke
attributes: Place one Impact token in base contact with each model within the Blast. These tokens count as obstacles. Remove all these tokens the next time you Inspire Your Team.

gear.name: incendiary rounds
attributes: This model's ranged attacks gain Dangerous and Deadly Crits.

gear.name: shrieker
attributes: Replace target rival's GREEN Action Token with a YELLOW one.

gear.name: silencer
attributes: This model's Basic Ranged Attacks and Pistols gain Silent.

gear.name: airhypo
attributes: Discard to Heal 1 on model when Inspire Team

gear.name: assault rifle
attributes: Rapid 2 at YELLOW and GREEN range

gear.name: body double
attributes: When this model is taken out, it does not drop a Body token and it keeps all equipped Gear and Loot (end all other effects as normal). The next time you Inspire Your Team, deploy this model within RED of any friendly model and this model suffers 1 wound. Then discard this card. Being taken out in this way does not count for any objectives.

gear.name: brass knuckles
attributes: When this attack is used as a [RE]Act, gain +2 to the roll.

gear.name: go bag
attributes: After an attack targeting this model resolves, if this model did not [RE]Act, it may discard this card to move GREEN.

gear.name: grapple gun
attributes: Discard during this model's activation to climb GREEN without using an Action Token or rolling.

gear.name: grenade smoke
attributes: Place one Impact token in base contact with each model within the Blast. These tokens count as obstacles. Remove all these tokens the next time you Inspire Your Team.

gear.name: hydraulic cyberarms
attributes: This model's Basic Melee Atttack gains Push.

gear.name: inconspicuous hoody
attributes: When this model is targeted by an attack at long range, it may discard this card to make the attack fail before dice are rolled (an Action Token is still used).
When this model is moving out of a Brawl, it may discard this card to do so without making a Reflexes roll.

gear.name: juice injector
attributes: Choose one: This model swaps 1 YELLOW Action Token for GREEN permanently OR it makes 2 basic melee or ranged attacks for free.

gear.name: militec upgraded cyberdeck
attributes: This model gains Netrunner. When this model chooses programs to install, it does so as if its Team has +1 Street Cred.

gear.name: netlinked targeting
attributes: When targeting a Rival with an attack, this model gains +1 to the roll for each Hacked token on the target.

gear.name: stims
attributes: When you Inspire Your Team, roll a RED die: Fumble = This model takes 1 sound; 2+ = Move RED for free.

gear.name: assault rifle
attributes: Rapid 2 at YELLOW and GREEN range

gear.name: autoblade
attributes: On a Crit, this model may attack with this weapon again for free (you may choose a different target).

gear.name: bio-toxin shiv
attributes: Target must either swap 1 GREEN Action Token for YELLOW permanently or suffer Stun 2.

gear.name: concert t-shirt
attributes: Place 2 Luck tokens on this Gear when it is equipped. Only this model may use these Luck tokens.

gear.name: grapple gun
attributes: Discard during this model's activation to climb GREEN without using an Action Token or rolling.

gear.name: hydraulic limbs
attributes: This model may move up to YELLOW when dragging models or objects. This model gains +2 to the Reflexes roll when attempting to initiate a drag action.

gear.name: inconspicuous hoody
attributes: When this model is targeted by an attack at long range, it may discard this card to make the attack fail before dice are rolled (an Action Token is still used).
When this model is moving out of a Brawl, it may discard this card to do so without making a Reflexes roll.

gear.name: metal detector
attributes: Whenever this model draws a card from the Loot deck, it draws 3 cards, picks 1 to keep, and places the other 2 at the bottom of the deck.

gear.name: neural uplink
attributes: All visible friendly Gonks may move YELLOW.

gear.name: pain editor
attributes: When this model is wounded, roll a RED die: If it is a Crit, ignor the wound.

gear.name: powerglove
attributes: If a model is wounded by this attack and is not taken out, it must take one action, for free, controlled by this model's controller.

gear.name: rocket skates
attributes: When this model activates, it may move GREEN for free. This model's basic move actions gain Dangerous.

gear.name: salvaged machine gun
attributes: This action may not be taken if this model moved during this activation.

gear.name: scavenged parts
attributes: Discard this during setup to draw 3 Loot cards. These may be given to any character. These cards don't count towards scenario or objective goals.

gear.name: tool kit
attributes: When this model discards a Loot card, it may roll a RED die. If it rolls a 5+ the Loot is not discarded.
